Description: Painted pottery shabti of Iqedu with a seed-basket on the back; feet lost; black (originally blue) tripartite wig ending in red and yellow stripe terminals; red striped yellow collar with rows of black internal divisions, arms crossed in relief to hold two red-bordered yellow hoes, with red criss-crossed yellow basket over shoulders on back; white body; red-bordered yellow background vertical line of black hieroglyphs.
